Please enable accessibility service to read and identify the positions of text elements and image elements on the screen to extract their text content. On the settings page, select this app and enable accessibility permission. \nOn accessibility settings go to installed / Downloaded Apps > Select PharaSnap and switch the toggle button to \'on\' state to grant accessibility service.

For PharaSnap to capture and copy text on the screen. It need access to Accessibility service to read text block on screen and as well identify images block are placed on the screen for image-to-text recognition. No personal data is collected and shared to third parties \nOn accessibility settings go to installed / Downloaded Apps > Select PharaSnap and switch the toggle button to \'on\' state to grant accessibility service.
Not detecting text? try troubleshoot

PharaSnap can help you copy text on the screen even on places where you don\'t have the facility directly copy text to clipboard. PharaSnap can even capture text on images without ever leaving the app

To make this tool easily accessible to use it is recommended to add the quick settings shortcut in your notification panel. Open your notification panel, in the top section (quick settings panel) then tap to customize the panel and add the shortcut tile provided by this app to the active area. Drag and place it on a convenient place \n\nAnother way to open the widget is by hold pressing the app launch icon which prompt you open the widget.

Quick launching from quick settings in notification tiles is the most recommended way to launch/open this tool because it is very quicker and you don\'t switch between apps, simply slide down the notification tile panel and tap the shortcut button

PharaSnap may wants to read visual content of the screen you will be for requested for allowing screen capture as a method to capture screenshot of the screen. Almost every time PharaSnap want to see the screen visually on demand for capturing cropped screenshots and recognizing text on images

PharaSnap has two modes text and picture mode. In text mode you can select and copy text - even text on images. In Picture mode you capture image of the specific element on the screen in a single tap.
This is an app developed by single person. If love this app useful I would like to hear your feedback and thoughts.

During development phase I have experienced text content some apps will not be available to extract like comment text on YouTube app. However after updating that app to latest version might resolve this issue. So if encountered a similar situation please make sure the host app in in latest version.\nIf none works restart the accessibility service by toggling on and off in accessibility settings

Some app can request some confidential/private pages on the app like igcognito tabs on chrome to be secured and blocks capturing visual contents on the screen which prevents image to text recognition to work. Please make sure content is not placed on secured screen for example like in chrome open the link from igconito tab to normal tab
